*******************************************************************************************************************
Rules:

-No Hacking
-Swearing on the scrim server will not be tolerated.
-All Avicus rules apply

(If one of your players breaks a rule your entire team is disqualified)
*******************************************************************************************************************
Dates:

1st Round- December 30, 2:00-4:00pm EST
                                                                       (I don't know the other Time zones sorry)
2nd Round- December 31, 2:00-4:00pm EST

(If these dates don't workout I can reschedule them, it is just I don't want to wait 6 months to release this)
*******************************************************************************************************************
Referees:

(Looking for 2-4 Referees who would be free those dates)
*******************************************************************************************************************
Team Application Format: (Minimum team amount *4*, Maximum team amount *8*) (10 Members per team, choose wisely)

Team Name:
10 Players playing:
Team Leaders Skype:

*******************************************************************************************************************

I also chose those dates to end off the Year as we head into 2k16!

*******************************************************************************************************************
